CustomField.description: When set, NewVoiceMedia will attempt to route new Cases to the Case owner. This does not affect updating cases, where NewVoiceMedia will always attempt to route to the Case owner.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: When set, NewVoiceMedia will attempt to route new Cases to the Case owner. This does not affect updating cases, where NewVoiceMedia will always attempt to route to the Case owner.
CustomField.label: TryRouteNewCaseToCaseOwner
